page.title: 05CHILDRENS' GAMES
page.content: SLAM! You play slam with two to six people. You need a football and a wall without any windows. The rules are you have to kick the ball against the wall. If you miss the ball or fail to kick the ball before it stops you go onto "S". If you miss a second time you go onto "SL" and so on. When you get to "SLAM" you are out. You go on like this until there is only one player left, he or she is the winner. by JAMES KAY. SCARECROW CHASE Any number can play this.You can play anywhere. The person who is on it has to tag somebody. If you are tagged you stand with your legs apart, until somebody goes under them. Then they start running again until they are tagged.If you are a "scarecrow" you cannot move. by GAVIN ELKINS.
